name: Superfish the Human
description:
This Sonic and Mario fan game is found on my old ass laptop. This game was supposed to be a Sonic-esque platformer with Mario elements. The game was supposed to release on 2018 but development soon halted because of the awful platforming physics I created, and I never use the Game Maker to make a game from scratch again since then. 

This prototype only contains a single platforming level with nothing in it. Superfish always bounces on the ground and I don't know how to fix it + I have sxxtload of schoolworks to do, so it was cancelled. 

If you ever want to use my crappy engine to make a platformer, make sure to credit me. 

All musics are from Sonic 2 HD.
